vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκρο-βυστία, ἡ,
foreskin, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
__II state of having the foreskin, uncircumcision, [NT]
__II.2 collective, the uncircumcised, [Refs]buśtu 'pudenda', Heb. bōsheth 'shame': wrongly derived from ἄκρος, βύω by [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: uncircumcision, foreskin; figuratively, not of the Mosaic covenant, a Gentile
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
uncircumcision, foreskin; figuratively, not of the Mosaic covenant, a Gentile
the state of being uncircumcised, Rom. 4:10; the abstract being put for the concrete, uncircumcised men, i.e., Gentiles, Rom. 4:9, et al
vocabInfos._es_Definition: el que no está circuncidado (con frecuencia los que no son judíos); ser gentil (HCH.11:3)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 包皮
2) (喻意) 未受割禮
3) 未受割禮的人, 外邦人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 包皮
2) (喻意) 未受割礼
3) 未受割礼的人, 外邦人
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự chẳng chịu cắt bì ; không chịu cắt bì ; người không cắt bì ; kẻ không cắt bì
